summary: A seemingly corrupt petty contractor faces challenges from the local municipality, his family, his employees, as well as a former girlfriend and her family.
cast: Akshay Kumar|Trisha Krishnan|Kulbhushan Kharbanda|Aruna Irani|Urvashi Sharma|Milind Gunaji|Manoj Joshi|Paritosh Sand|Rajpal Yadav|Johnny Lever|Asrani|Makrand Deshpande|Neeraj Vora|Esha|Geeta|Pooja Bhatt|Tinnu Anand|Kainaat Arora|Sanjay Belose|Swantatra Bharat|Anupam Bhattacharya|Nagesh Bhonsle|Paresh Bramhbhatt|Anand Ingle|Anant Jog|Amita Nangia|Kanchan Pagare|Atul Parchure|Preity Pundir|Pradeep Vengurlekar|Geetha Vijayan|Jaideep Ahlawat
title: Khatta Meetha
